actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Armed Services.

official_title: A bill to amend title 10 of the United States Code to provide that no enlisted member of the Armed Forces may be separated from service under conditions other than honorable solely by administrative action, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Provides that no enlisted member of the armed forces may be separated from service under conditions other than honorable solely by administrative action. (Adds 10 U.S.C. 1174).

titles.title: A bill to amend title 10 of the United States Code to provide that no enlisted member of the Armed Forces may be separated from service under conditions other than honorable solely by administrative action, and for other purposes.
